amendment.description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to restrict the Department of Defense from transferring certain surplus military property to federal, state, or local law enforcement agencies.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to restrict the Department of Defense from transferring certain surplus military property to federal, state, or local law enforcement agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A020) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 198 - 231 (Roll no. 281).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A020) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Johnson (GA).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A020) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 198 - 231 (Roll no. 281).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson (GA) amendment (A020) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 198 - 231 (Roll no. 281).
